settings.title: Can I customize my Ink Lite?
settings.text: Yes – just keep in mind that the more you customize, the more costs can increase.

settings.title: Is there a warranty?
settings.text: Yes. Commercial Grade Lighting has a two year guarantee.  Smaller lights and light strips have a 10 day return policy, but that has been suspended with Covid 19.

settings.title: Does the light have batteries or is it plugged in?
settings.text: We do both –for lights under a two foot perimeter.

settings.title: Do you have all the college licenses?
settings.text: No, but we’d like to continually add.   Please let us know if your college or business would like to be added to our list!

settings.title: Are you hiring?
settings.text: Yes!   We are looking for interns and full time sales people.   Please contact us at info@InkLites.com, or call 844-INK-LITES

settings.title: What sizes do you have?
settings.text:
We do our best to limit the skews, and focus on few sizes, but can craft almost any size upon request:
Different lengths of LED light strips:

-8 inches x 10 inches

-10 inches x 12 inches 

-2 foot x 2 foot

-2 foot x 4 foot

-2 foot x 4 foot

settings.title: Shipping policy
settings.text: We proud ourselves on fast, safe shipping

settings.title: Where do you ship to?
settings.text: We ship all around the world. International rates apply

settings.title: How long will my order take?
Returns and exchanges
settings.text: 2 year manufactures guarantee on commercial grade custom prints.

settings.title: How do I ship my order back to you?
settings.text: Smaller lights and light strips have a 10 day return policy, but that has been suspended with Covid 19.

settings.title: Interns/Influencers/Careers
settings.text:
-Ink Lites is looking for university interns and Influencers to help market an promote their brand!
-EARN WHILE YOU LEARN!
-Info@InkLites 844-INK-LITES
